description: Number of free subsets of multiplicative group of GF(7^n).
references: P. Bouchard and Y.-N. Yeh, Finding f-free subsets of maximal cardinality, Séries Formelles et Combinatoire Algébrique, 4th colloquium, 15-19 Juin 1992, Montréal, Université du Québec à Montréal, pp. 11-17.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _Simon Plouffe_
